text: McDaniel Building is a historic commercial building located at Springfield, Greene County, Missouri. It was built in 1961, and is houses six-story with a Mid-Century Modern style of building, containing a two-story main section, two-bay section and a tall one-story rear section. It has buff brick walls, a curtain wall façade, and a flat roof. (includes 16 photographs from 2014) It was listed on the National Register of Historic Places in 2014. ==References== Category:Commercial buildings on the National Register of Historic Places in Missouri Category:Modernist architecture in Missouri Category:Commercial buildings completed in 1961 Category:Buildings and structures in Springfield, Missouri Category:National Register of Historic Places in Greene County, Missouri
title: McDaniel Building
